name: Plastic pH Test Strips, Universal Application (pH 0-14), 100 Strips | for Saliva, Soap, Urine, Food, Liquids, Water with Soil Testing, Lab Monitoring, etc.
short_description: MEASURE pH LEVEL Our plastic pH test strips are ideal for testing the acidity in a wide range of products: water, human and pet urine, saliva, soil, soap, skincare, and more. These are laboratory and diagnostic grade pH test strips., and much more!

FAST RESULTS Take one strip from the case and dip it into your solution. The strip colors will change almost instantly. Quickly match these colors against the color chart on the case to obtain the pH. The number above the matching color is your pH.
PROPER STORAGE To ensure accuracy, store these pH strips in their original packaging and in a cool, dry place away from sunlight.

pH FULL RANGE AND INTERVALS Our pH 0-14 test strips are offered in increments by 1 pH unit. The pH color chart intervals cover: 0 (very acidic), 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 (neutral), 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14 (very basic).

short_description: Monitor Your Health – Take a look at your body from the inside out with saliva and urine pH test strips for humans. Your kit has 125 strips, a color test chart, and easy PDF instructions by Just Fitter.

Stay on Track – According to Nobel Prize winner Dr. Warburg, “Disease can’t survive in an alkaline body.” Use your alkaline strips test for humans multiple times daily to monitor your diet’s progress.
Uncompromised Accuracy – Seal your light-blocking bottle and store your pH strips for urine and saliva in a dry place. Do not use your strips to test blood, products, or pool water.
